comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: Made a pull request for this. Had most of the bits lying around to implement it, went ahead and finished it off. Should go out with the next deploy (probably mid next week), let me know if you have any suggestions for changes to the output format before then.

comments.author: Sazis.3546
comments.body: Can we get the possibility to read the guild vault log using the API? I am writing an app to make managing my guild easier, and this would allow me to add some cool features.
